医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究综述微生物琥珀酸生产现状同行评审期刊《工业生物技术》上的一篇综合评论文章讨论了生物基琥珀酸成功工业化的现状和未来前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Study-reviews-the-status-of-microbial-succinic-acid-production.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Study-reviews-the-status-of-microbial-succinic-acid-production.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdc31746-779c-44ba-a237-7b30a7d96bd4 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 00:12:20 -0400 Study reviews the status of microbial succinic acid production
新型光子雷达系统可实现高精度和非侵入性监测在各种临床环境中，例如重症监护病房、健康状况危急的患者、老年护理机构和监狱的健康监测，或在困倦可能导致事故的安全监测情况下，都需要对生命体征进行持续监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/New-photonic-radar-system-allows-highly-precise-and-non-pressive-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/New-photonic-radar-system-allows-highly-precise-and-non-pressive-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=faf912aa-1d96-4ac2-b374-ffb719c97b87 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 00:09:13 -0400 New photonic radar system allows highly precise and non-invasive monitoring
研究发现，艾滋病毒患者容易受到抑郁和焦虑等社会心理挑战COVID-19 大流行对全国和世界各地产生了重大的心理影响。新的研究表明，艾滋病毒感染者特别容易受到抑郁、焦虑、药物滥用、孤独等心理社会挑战的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/HIV-患者-susceptible-to-psychosocial-challenges-like-depression-and-anxiety-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/HIV-患者-susceptible-to-psychosocial-challenges-like-depression-and-anxiety-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=255b920c-d766-4bd6-a75a-af1c957549ac Fri, 30 Jun 2023 00:06:01 -0400 HIV patients susceptible to psychosocial challenges like depression and anxiety, finds study
童年时期的挑食习惯一直持续到成年，影响饮食选择研究探讨了幼儿时期的挑食与其对成年早期食物消费模式和体重状况的长期影响之间的关联。该研究旨在深入了解挑食和饮食习惯之间的关系，以及对体重管理的潜在影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Childhood-picky-eating-habits-persist-into-adulthood-impacting-dietary-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Childhood-picky-eating-habits-persist-into-adulthood-impacting-dietary-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cef373a7-44fd-4cb0-a258-3b22b31058a8 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 23:21:00 -0400 Childhood picky eating habits persist into adulthood, impacting dietary choices
野猪和猕猴数量的激增可能会增加疾病的爆发昆士兰大学领导的研究表明，东南亚野猪和猕猴数量的激增正在威胁原生森林以及牲畜和人类的疾病爆发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Exploding-populations-of-wild-pigs-and-macaque-monkeys-could-increase-disease-outbreaks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Exploding-populations-of-wild-pigs-and-macaque-monkeys-could-increase-disease-outbreaks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ef50c40-fc06-42b0-acf6-09ac339a6e3e Thu, 29 Jun 2023 23:03:00 -0400 Exploding populations of wild pigs and macaque monkeys could increase disease outbreaks
科学家将染色体上基因区域的动态运动可视化尽管存储我们遗传信息的染色体紧密排列以适应细胞核，但它始终处于运动状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Scientists-visualize-dynamic-motion-of-gene-regions-on-chromosomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Scientists-visualize-dynamic-motion-of-gene-regions-on-chromosomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4db044d-72df-467a-bdc4-4e9923a3b620 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 22:59:00 -0400 Scientists visualize dynamic motion of gene regions on chromosomes
女性健康研究中的选择偏差可能掩盖黑人和西班牙裔女性更年期提前的事实密歇根大学领导的新研究表明，女性健康研究中的参与者选择偏差可能掩盖了黑人和西班牙裔女性更年期提前的现象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Selection-bias-in-womens-health-studies-may-mask-earlier-onset-menopause-for-Black-and-Hispanic-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Selection-bias-in-womens-health-studies-may-mask-earlier-onset-menopause-for-Black-and-Hispanic-women.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c9f364b-0523-4631-affc-0e556714d93f Thu, 29 Jun 2023 22:55:16 -0400 Selection bias in women's health studies may mask earlier onset menopause for Black and Hispanic women
健康的生活方式可降低患严重肝病的风险研究人员调查了新发严重非酒精性脂肪肝中健康生活方式与 Life's Essential 8 评分之间的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/A-healthy-lifestyle-reduces-risk-of-developmenting-severe-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/A-healthy-lifestyle-reduces-risk-of-developmenting-severe-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=461f6357-8db9-4321-b79c-3ab7838aab3d Thu, 29 Jun 2023 22:48:00 -0400 A healthy lifestyle reduces risk of developing severe liver disease
利用机器学习的力量开发沉思的预测模型我们的思想经常陷入重复的想法中，例如过去的错误、遗憾、不安全感或未解决的冲突。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Using-the-power-of-machine-learning-to-develop-a-predictive-model-of-rumination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Using-the-power-of-machine-learning-to-develop-a-predictive-model-of-rumination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de9bbaa8-5481-4e04-af29-9b9af249d7de Thu, 29 Jun 2023 22:45:00 -0400 Using the power of machine learning to develop a predictive model of rumination
生活在历史红线社区可能会增加肾衰竭的风险新的研究表明，历史上红线社区对健康和财富资源的长期投资减少可能导致当今黑人成年人肾衰竭的比例过高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Living-in-a-historically-redlined-neighborhood-may-increase-risk-of-kidney-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Living-in-a-historically-redlined-neighborhood-may-increase-risk-of-kidney-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=586d4245-2dc4-4fe5-bba3-aa1e9de7c8d7 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 22:37:22 -0400 Living in a historically redlined neighborhood may increase risk of kidney failure
